Package de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking

Contains all networking classes required by the app: Discovery system: DiscoveryClient Data pipeline start: UdpConnection Data- and command connection manager: NetworkClient The CommandConnection is in the common package

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NetworkClient.TimeoutListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncSendCommand
    This class is a wrapper for sending commands to avoid dealing with network on the ui thread.
    Broadcaster
    This class can be used together with Timer to periodically send broadcasts into the network.
    DiscoveryClient
    This thread manages sending discovery request packages and receiving answers from servers.
    NetworkClient
    The network client contains both the command and the data connection.
    UdpConnection
    The UdpConnection class is an UDP implementation of the DataSink interface; it sends all input data to the host and port given in the constructor

Package de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking Description

Contains all networking classes required by the app:
  • Discovery system: DiscoveryClient
  • Data pipeline start: UdpConnection
  • Data- and command connection manager: NetworkClient
  • The CommandConnection is in the common package
